title: Lakshmi Kanchan Jhumkaalu: Ruby and Diamond Embellished Temple Earrings
materials: White CZ Diamonds (American Diamonds) - Hyderabadi Polish
features: Classic temple jhumka design featuring a teardrop-shaped ruby as the focal point, surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZ diamonds. The Jhumka bell is intricately filigreed and features delicate gold bead (gundu) detailing along the bottom, creating a graceful movement. The setting is expertly crafted to maximize the brilliance of the stones.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement with traditional South Indian elegance. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: These exquisite jhumkas are a testament to the timeless beauty of South Indian jewelry. The combination of high-quality 22K gold, vibrant rubies, and dazzling CZ diamonds creates a luxurious and eye-catching piece. The intricate filigree work and delicate gold bead detailing showcase the exceptional craftsmanship of our artisans. They are lightweight and comfortable to wear, making them perfect for long events.
